attributes.action: Scrap any ideas about fitting speed limiters to motorcycles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is following the news that plans are in place to fit restrictions to motorbikes (to make them more safe!) reducing power would make them more dangerous, and exposing us to dangerous car drivers even more!

Please sign this petition to show that limiting motorbikes is NOT the right way to go around business!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
